Cookie Policy

Last Updated: 16-04-2025

1. What Are Cookies

Cookies are small text files stored on your device when you visit websites. We use cookies and similar technologies to enhance your experience and analyze service usage.

2. How We Use Cookies

Smart Applicant uses cookies for:

Cookie Type Purpose Duration
Essential Cookies Enable core functionality (e.g., security, account login) Session
Performance Cookies Analyze site usage to improve services 1-2 years
Functionality Cookies Remember preferences and settings 1 year

We do not use cookies for advertising purposes.

3. Third-Party Cookies

We may use these third-party services that set cookies:

  • Google Analytics: Helps analyze website traffic (you can opt-out via their opt-out tool)
  • Cloudflare: Provides security and performance optimization

4. Managing Cookies

You can control cookies through:

  • Browser Settings: Most browsers allow you to refuse or delete cookies (see aboutcookies.org for guidance)
  • Cookie Consent Tool: Our cookie banner lets you manage preferences

Note: Disabling essential cookies may affect website functionality.

5. Changes to This Policy

We may update this Cookie Policy. Significant changes will be announced through our website or via email for registered users.
